trans-unit.source: Implements the basic functionality common to button controls.
trans-unit.target: Implementerer basisfunksjonalitet som er felles for kontrollene.

trans-unit.source: You do not typically inherit from ButtonBase.
trans-unit.target: Du vanligvis arver ikke fra ButtonBase.

trans-unit.source: To create your own button class, inherit from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> class.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil opprette dine egne knappen klassen arver fra den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox>, eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>klasse.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>

trans-unit.source: To have the derived button control display an image, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.Image%2A> property or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageList%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageIndex%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil avledede knappekontrollen Vis et bilde, kan du angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.Image%2A>egenskapen eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageList%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageIndex%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageList%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.Image%2A>

trans-unit.source: The image can be aligned on the button control by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageAlign%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Bildet kan være justert for knappekontrollen ved å angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageAlign%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageAlign%2A>

trans-unit.source: Likewise, to align the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A> displayed on the button control, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.TextAlign%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: På samme måte å justere den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A>vises på knappekontrollen, angitt i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.TextAlign%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.TextAlign%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.FlatStyle%2A> property determines the style and appearance of the control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.FlatStyle%2A>egenskapen bestemmer og utseendet for kontrollen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.FlatStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.FlatStyle%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle?displayProperty=fullName>, the user's operating system determines the appearance of the control.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.FlatStyle%2A>er satt til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle?displayProperty=fullName>, brukerens operativsystemet bestemmer utseendet for kontrollen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.FlatStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the ellipsis character (...) appears at the right edge of the control, denoting that the control text extends beyond the specified length of the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om tegn ellipsen (...) vises i høyre kant av kontrollen, som angir at teksten kontroll overskrider den angitte lengden for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Set AutoEllipsis to `true` to display text that extends beyond the width of the control when the user passes over the control with the mouse.
trans-unit.target: Angi AutoEllipsis `true` til å vise tekst som overskrider bredden på kontrollen når brukeren sender over kontroll med musen.

trans-unit.source: You must set the control's `AutoSize` property to `false` if you want AutoEllipsis to be `true`.
trans-unit.target: Du må angi en verdi for `AutoSize` egenskapen `false` Hvis du vil AutoEllipsis skal `true`.

trans-unit.source: If `AutoSize` is `true`, the control will grow to fit the text and an ellipsis will not appear.
trans-unit.target: Hvis `AutoSize` er `true`kontrollen skal utvides til å få plass teksten og en ellipsen vises ikke.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the additional label text is to be indicated by an ellipsis; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis flere etiketteksten skal angis med en ellipsen; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the control resizes based on its contents.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om kontrollen endrer størrelse basert på innholdet.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control automatically resizes based on its contents; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis kontrollen skaleres automatisk basert på innholdet; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.AutoSize*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.AutoSize*>egenskapsendringer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.AutoSize*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [behandling og opprettet hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color of the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir bakgrunnsfargen for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value representing the background color.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> verdien som representerer bakgrunnsfarge.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new accessibility object for the control.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter et nytt tilgjengelighet-objekt for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> for the control.
trans-unit.target: En ny <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"> </xref> for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the required creation parameters when the control handle is created.
trans-unit.target: Henter oppretting av nødvendige parameterne når kontrollen referansen opprettes.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams"></xref> that contains the required creation parameters when the handle to the control is created.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams"> </xref> som inneholder de nødvendige oppretting parameterne når håndtaket for kontrollen som er opprettet.

trans-unit.source: Gets the default Input Method Editor (IME) mode supported by this control.
trans-unit.target: Henter standardmodus Input metoden redigeringsprogrammet (IME) støttes av denne kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: As implemented in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase> class, this property always returns the `Disable` value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Som implementert i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase>klasse egenskapen returnerer alltid den `Disable` verdien for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: Gets the default size of the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter standardstørrelsen på kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The default <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> of the control.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Frigir uforvaltede ressursene som brukes av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase"> </xref> og eventuelt frigir administrerte ressurser.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kalles av offentlig `Dispose` metoden og <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>metode.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose`Aktiverer den beskyttede `Dispose(Boolean)` metoden med den `disposing` parameteren satt til `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>aktiverer `Dispose` med `disposing` satt til `false`.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase> references.
trans-unit.target: Når den `disposing` -parameteren er SANN, denne metoden Frigjør alle ressurser holdes av administrerte objekter som denne <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase>referanser.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden starter den `Dispose` metode for hver referert objekt.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>å frigjøre både administrerte og uforvaltede ressurser. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> frigi bare uforvaltede ressurser.

trans-unit.source: Gets the appearance of the border and the colors used to indicate check state and mouse state.
trans-unit.target: Henter utseendet på kantlinjen og fargene som brukes til å angi Kontroller tilstand og Mustilstand.

trans-unit.source: Use the FlatAppearance property only with <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> controls whose <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle>.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen FlatAppearance bare bruke med <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>kontrollerer <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle>er <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatButtonAppearance"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatButtonAppearance"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the flat style appearance of the button control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir utseendet flate stilen for knappekontrollen.

trans-unit.source: When the FlatStyle property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox> classes is set to `System`, the control is drawn by the user's operating system and the check alignment is based upon the `CheckAlign` and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.TextAlign%2A> property values.
trans-unit.target: Når egenskapen FlatStyle for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox>klasser er satt til `System`kontrollen tegnes med brukerens operativsystem og se justeringen er basert på den `CheckAlign` og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.TextAlign%2A>egenskapsverdier.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.TextAlign%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>

trans-unit.source: The `CheckAlign` property value is not changed, but the appearance of the control can be affected.
trans-unit.target: Den `CheckAlign` egenskapsverdien er ikke endret, men utseendet til kontrollen kan bli påvirket.

trans-unit.source: The check box is horizontally aligned with either the left or right edge of the control (a left or center alignment appears left aligned, right remains unchanged), and vertically aligned the same as the descriptive text.
trans-unit.target: Merket for justeres vannrett med venstre eller høyre kant av kontrollen (justering for eller midtstilles vises venstre justerte, høyre endres), og justert loddrett den samme som den beskrivende teksten.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox> control with a `CheckAlign` property value of `ContentAlignment`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du for eksempel en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox>styre med en `CheckAlign` egenskapsverdi for `ContentAlignment`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox>

trans-unit.source: `MiddleCenter`, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.TextAlign%2A> property value of `ContentAlignment.TopRight`, and the FlatStyle property value is set to `System`, the check box alignment will appear to be `ContentAlignment.TopLeft` while the text alignment remains unchanged.
trans-unit.target: `MiddleCenter`, en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.TextAlign%2A>egenskapsverdi for `ContentAlignment.TopRight`, og FlatStyle egenskapsverdien er satt til `System`, vises merket justeringen skal `ContentAlignment.TopLeft` under tekstjustering forblir uendret.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.TextAlign%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the FlatStyle property is set to `FlatStyle.System`, any images assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.Image%2A> property are not displayed.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis egenskapen FlatStyle er satt til `FlatStyle.System`, bilder som er tilordnet til den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.Image%2A>egenskapen blir ikke vist.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.Image%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_Standard" name="Standard" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_Standard" name="Standard" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value assigned is not one of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Verdien som er tilordnet er ikke én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the size of a rectangular area into which a control can be fitted.
trans-unit.target: Henter størrelsen på et rektangulært område som en kontroll kan tilpasses.

trans-unit.source: The behavior of GetPreferredSize differs by control.
trans-unit.target: Virkemåten for GetPreferredSize er forskjellig av kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LayoutEngine%2A> might be unable to assign the returned size to the control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LayoutEngine%2A>kan ikke tildele returnerte størrelsen på kontrollen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LayoutEngine%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can return a size larger than the constraints indicated in the `proposedSize` parameter, but `proposedSize` should decrease as the constraint decreases.
trans-unit.target: Du kan returnere en størrelse større enn begrensninger som er angitt i den `proposedSize` parameteren, men `proposedSize` må redusere etter begrensningen reduserer.

trans-unit.source: For example, `GetPreferredSize(new Size(100, 0))` should not be wider than `GetPreferredSize(new Size(200, 0))`.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel `GetPreferredSize(new Size(100, 0))` kan ikke være større enn `GetPreferredSize(new Size(200, 0))`.

trans-unit.source: The exception is a `proposedSize` of 0 or `Size.Empty`, which are defined as unconstrained.
trans-unit.target: Unntaket er en `proposedSize` 0 eller `Size.Empty`, som er definert som ubegrenset.

trans-unit.source: The custom-sized area for a control.
trans-unit.target: Egendefinert størrelse området for en kontroll.

trans-unit.source: An ordered pair of type <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> representing the width and height of a rectangle.
trans-unit.target: En i par med typen <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> som representerer bredden og høyden på et rektangel.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the image that is displayed on a button control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir som vises på en knappekontrollen.

trans-unit.source: When the Image property is set, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageList%2A> property will be set to `null`, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageIndex%2A> property will be set to its default, -1.
trans-unit.target: Når Bildeegenskapen er angitt, den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageList%2A>egenskapen settes til `null`, og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageIndex%2A>egenskapen settes til standard, -1.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageList%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.FlatStyle%2A> property is set to `FlatStyle.System`, any images assigned to the Image property are not displayed.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.FlatStyle%2A>er satt til `FlatStyle.System`, vises ikke alle bilder som er tilordnet til egenskapen Image.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.FlatStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> displayed on the button control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref> vises på knappekontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the alignment of the image on the button control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir justeringen for bildet for knappen.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_MiddleCenter" name="MiddleCenter" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_MiddleCenter" name="MiddleCenter" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value assigned is not one of the <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Verdien som er tilordnet er ikke én av de <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the image list index value of the image displayed on the button control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir indeksverdien for bildet for bildet som vises på knappekontrollen.

trans-unit.source: When the ImageIndex or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageList%2A> properties are set, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.Image%2A> property is set to its default value, `null`.
trans-unit.target: Når ImageIndex eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageList%2A>egenskapene er angitt i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.Image%2A>egenskapen er satt til standardverdien, `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.Image%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageList%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageList%2A> property value is changed to `null`, the ImageIndex property returns its default value, -1.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageList%2A>egenskapsverdien er endret til `null`, egenskapen ImageIndex returnerer standardverdien, -1.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageList%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, the assigned ImageIndex value is retained internally and used when another <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> object is assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageList%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for tilordnede ImageIndex er imidlertid beholdes internt og brukes når en annen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>objektet er tilordnet til den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageList%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageList%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>

trans-unit.source: If the new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageList%2A> property has an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageCollection.Count%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property value that is less than or equal to the value assigned to the ImageIndex property minus one (to account for the collection being a zero-based index), the ImageIndex property value is adjusted to one less than the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageCollection.Count%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den nye <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>tilordnet av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageList%2A>egenskapen har en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageCollection.Count%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapsverdi som er mindre enn eller lik verdien som er tilordnet til egenskapen ImageIndex minus én (for å kompensere for samlingen er en nullbasert indeks) ImageIndex egenskapsverdien justeres til en lavere verdi enn egenskapen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageCollection.Count%2A>egenskapsverdi.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageCollection.Count%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageCollection.Count%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageList%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>

trans-unit.source: For example, consider a button control whose <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> has three images and whose ImageIndex property is set to 2.
trans-unit.target: Eksempel: en knapp som har egenskapen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>tre bilder og der ImageIndex-egenskapen er satt til 2.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>

trans-unit.source: If a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> that has only two images is assigned to the button, the ImageIndex value changes to 1.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en ny <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>som har bare to bilder er tildelt av-knappen, ImageIndex verdi endres til 1.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>

trans-unit.source: A zero-based index, which represents the image position in an <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En nullbasert indeks som representerer bildet posisjonen i en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is -1.
trans-unit.target: Standard er -1.

trans-unit.source: The assigned value is less than the lower bounds of the ImageIndex.
trans-unit.target: Tilordnet verdien er mindre enn de nedre grensen av ImageIndex.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the key accessor for the image in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageList*>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir nøkkelen aksessor for bildet i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageList*>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageList*>

trans-unit.source: The ImageKey property specifies the image from the image list to display on the control.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen ImageKey angir hvilket bilde fra bildelisten skal vises i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: A string representing the key of the image.
trans-unit.target: En streng som representerer nøkkelen til bildet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"></xref> that contains the <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> displayed on a button control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"> </xref> som inneholder den <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref> vises på en knappekontrollen.

trans-unit.source: When the ImageList or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageIndex%2A> property is set, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.Image%2A> property is set `null`, which is its default value.
trans-unit.target: Når ImageList eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageIndex%2A>egenskapen er angitt, den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.Image%2A>settes `null`, som er standardverdien.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.Image%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the ImageList property value is changed to `null`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageIndex%2A> property returns its default value, -1.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis ImageList egenskapsverdien er endret til `null`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageIndex%2A>egenskapen returnerer standardverdien, -1.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, the assigned <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageIndex%2A> value is retained internally and used when another <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> is assigned to the ImageList property.
trans-unit.target: Imidlertid tilordnet <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageIndex%2A>verdien er beholdt internt og brukes når en annen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>er tilordnet til egenskapen ImageList.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> assigned to the ImageList property has an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageCollection.Count%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property value that is less than or equal to the value assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageIndex%2A> property minus one (because the collection is a zero-based index), the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageIndex%2A> property value is adjusted to one less than the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageCollection.Count%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den nye <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>tilordnet ImageList egenskapen har en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageCollection.Count%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapsverdi som er mindre enn eller lik verdien som er tilordnet til den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageIndex%2A>Obligatorisk (fordi samlingen er en nullbasert indeks), <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageIndex%2A>egenskapsverdien justeres til en lavere verdi enn egenskapen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageCollection.Count%2A>egenskapsverdi.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageCollection.Count%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageCollection.Count%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>

trans-unit.source: For example, consider a button control whose <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> has three images and whose <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageIndex%2A> property is set to 2.
trans-unit.target: Eksempel: en knapp som har egenskapen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>tre bilder og der <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageIndex%2A>egenskapen er satt til 2.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>

trans-unit.source: If a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> that has only two images is assigned to the button, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageIndex%2A> value changes to 1.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en ny <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>som har to bilder er tildelt av-knappen, den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageIndex%2A>verdien endres til 1.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: An <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the Input Method Editor (IME) mode supported by this control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir inndataene metoden redigeringsprogrammet IME ()-modus støttes av denne kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen gjelder ikke for denne klassen.

trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImeMode*> property is changed.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the button control is the default button.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om knappekontrollen er standard.

trans-unit.source: When the IsDefault property is set to `true`, the button is the default button for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: Når egenskapen IsDefault er satt til `true`, knappen er standardknappen for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: This means that the button is clicked when the ENTER key is pressed if no other button or any other control that captures the ENTER key has focus.
trans-unit.target: Dette betyr at den ble brukt når angi tasten hvis ingen andre knapp eller annen kontroll som dekker angi nøkkelen er i fokus.

trans-unit.source: To specify the default button of a form, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AcceptButton%2A> property of the form to the desired button.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil angi standardknappen i et skjema, kan du angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AcceptButton%2A>skjemaet til knappen ønsket.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AcceptButton%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the button control is the default button; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis knappekontrollen standardknappen; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Opprettet en hendelse aktiverer hendelsesbehandlingen via en representant.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [behandling og opprettet hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The OnGotFocus method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnGotFocus kan også avledede klasser behandle hendelsen uten å knytte representant.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Dette er den foretrukne metoden for behandling av hendelsen i en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.EventArgs>som inneholder Hendelsesdata.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.OnKeyUp*> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.OnKeyUp*>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.OnKeyUp*>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Opprettet en hendelse aktiverer hendelsesbehandlingen via en representant.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [behandling og opprettet hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The OnKeyDown method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnKeyDown kan også avledede klasser behandle hendelsen uten å knytte representant.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Dette er den foretrukne metoden for behandling av hendelsen i en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Do not call OnKeyDown if the button is disabled (this includes calls to the base class's OnKeyDown method when you override OnKeyDown in a derived class).
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Ikke kall OnKeyDown Hvis knappen er deaktivert (Dette omfatter kall til den basisklassen OnKeyDown metoden når du overstyre OnKeyDown i en avledet klasse).

trans-unit.source: When disabling the button in an override of OnKeyDown, call the base class's OnKeyDown method before disabling the button, or do not call it at all.
trans-unit.target: Ved deaktivering av-knappen i en overstyring av OnKeyDown kalle den basisklassen OnKeyDown metoden før du deaktiverer knappen, eller ikke kall det hele tatt.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs"> </xref> som inneholder hendelsesdataene.

trans-unit.source: Resets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Button"></xref> control to the state before it is pressed and redraws it.
trans-unit.target: Tilbakestiller det <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Button"> </xref> tilgangskontroll til tilstanden før den trykkes og tegner den.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text associated with this control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir teksten som er forbundet med denne kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The text associated with this control.
trans-unit.target: Teksten som er forbundet med denne kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the alignment of the text on the button control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir justeringen for teksten på knappen.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_MiddleCenter" name="MiddleCenter" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_MiddleCenter" name="MiddleCenter" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value assigned is not one of the <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Verdien som er tilordnet er ikke én av de <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the position of text and image relative to each other.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir plasseringen av tekst og bilde i forhold til hverandre.

trans-unit.source: One of the values of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextImageRelation"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En av verdiene i <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextImageRelation"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextImageRelation"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextImageRelation"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value is not one of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextImageRelation"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Verdien er ikke én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextImageRelation"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines whether to use the <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> class ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]) or the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer"></xref> class ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/add/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]) to render text.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som bestemmer om du vil bruke den <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> klassen ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]) eller <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer"> </xref> klassen ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/add/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]) til å gjengi tekst.

trans-unit.source: The `UseCompatibleTextRendering` property is intended to provide visual compatibility between Windows Forms controls that render text using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer> class and [!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/add/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/add/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)] applications that perform custom text rendering using the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> class.
trans-unit.target: Den `UseCompatibleTextRendering` egenskapen er ikke ment å gi visual kompatibilitet mellom Windows Forms-Kontroller at gjengivelse tekst ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer>klassen og [!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/add/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)] og [!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/add/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)] programmer som utfører gjengivelse av egendefinert tekst ved hjelp av <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>klasse.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer>

trans-unit.source: In most cases, if your application is not being upgraded from [!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/add/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/add/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)], it is recommended that you leave `UseCompatibleTextRendering` set to the default value of `false`.
trans-unit.target: I de fleste tilfeller Hvis programmet ikke blir oppgradert fra [!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/add/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)] eller [!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/add/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)], anbefales det at du har forlatt `UseCompatibleTextRendering` satt til standardverdien for `false`.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/add/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] based <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer> class was introduced in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/add/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)] to improve performance, make text look better, and improve support for international fonts.
trans-unit.target: Den [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/add/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] basert <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer>klassen ble introdusert i den [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/add/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)] for å forbedre ytelsen, gjør teksten se bedre, og forbedre støtte for internasjonale skrifter.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer>

trans-unit.source: In earlier versions of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)], the [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] based <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> class was used to perform all text rendering.
trans-unit.target: I tidligere versjoner av den [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)], [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] basert <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>klassen ble brukt til å utføre gjengivelse av alle text.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/add/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] calculates character spacing and word wrapping differently from [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/add/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]beregner tegnavstand og tekstbryting forskjellig fra [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: In a Windows Forms application that uses the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> class to render text, this could cause the text for controls that use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer> to appear different from the other text in the application.
trans-unit.target: I et Windows Forms-program som bruker den <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>klasse for å gjengi tekst, dette kan føre til at teksten for kontroller som bruker <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer>vises forskjellig fra teksten i applikasjonen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: To resolve this incompatibility, you can set the `UseCompatibleTextRendering` property to `true` for a specific control.
trans-unit.target: Du kan konfigurere for å løse denne versjoner av `UseCompatibleTextRendering` egenskapen `true` for en bestemt kontroll.

trans-unit.source: To set `UseCompatibleTextRendering` to `true` for all supported controls in the application, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.SetCompatibleTextRenderingDefault%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method with a parameter of `true`.
trans-unit.target: Angi `UseCompatibleTextRendering` til `true` for alle støttede kontroller i programmet, kan du kalle den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.SetCompatibleTextRenderingDefault%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metode med en parameter for `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.SetCompatibleTextRenderingDefault%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> class should be used to perform text rendering for compatibility with versions 1.0 and 1.1.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> klassen som skal brukes til å utføre teksten gjengivelse for kompatibilitet med versjon 1.0 og 1.1.

trans-unit.source: of the .NET Framework; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: av .NET Framework; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the first character that is preceded by an ampersand (&) is used as the mnemonic key of the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om det første tegnet som begynner med et &-tegn (&) brukes som etikettens nøkkelen for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the first character that is preceded by an ampersand (&) is used as the mnemonic key of the control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis først tegnet som begynner med et &-tegn (&) er brukt som etikettens hurtigtast kontrollens; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines if the background is drawn using visual styles, if supported.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om bakgrunnen tegnes med visuelle stiler hvis støttes.

trans-unit.source: Visual styles are specifications for the appearance of controls.
trans-unit.target: Visuelle stiler er spesifikasjoner for visning av kontroller.

trans-unit.source: For example, visual styles can define the color, size, and font of controls, and they enable you to configure the visual interface to coordinate with your application interface.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel visuelle stiler kan definere farge, størrelse og skrifttypen for kontroller, og de gjør det mulig å konfigurere visual grensesnittet å passe til dine programgrensesnitt.

trans-unit.source: Additionally, they provide a mechanism for all Windows-based applications to have visual styles applied.
trans-unit.target: I tillegg kan du gi for alle Windows-baserte programmer har visuelle stiler.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the background is drawn using visual styles; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis bakgrunnen tegnes med visuelle stiler; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Processes Windows messages.
trans-unit.target: Behandler Windows meldinger.

trans-unit.source: The Windows <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"></xref> to process.
trans-unit.target: Windows <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"> </xref> prosessen.
